title: Smoke
description: A provisioner aggressively sells traps and poison to help locals deal with wildlife, driven into their communities by a forest fire. A toddler ingests some poisoned meat, so a Hobo-lead team set out to fly in the antidote in poor weather.

title: Manhunt: Part 1
description: Hobo helps a man accused of murder escape from angry villagers.

title: Manhunt: Part 2
description: The innocent fugitive continues to evade his pursuers while the Hobo acts as decoy.

title: The Defector
description: An Eastern European ballerina tries to defect but is caught. The Hobo, along with a human sidekick, try to rescue her, but unfortunately, her kidnappers have help from the local police.

title: Double Trouble
description: The Hobo, and a charming human peer, conspire to save a couple of horses who are about to be put down and turned into fertilizer.

title: Silent Witness
description: The Hobo witnesses a drunken hit-and-run and haunts the perpetrator, playing his conscience against him.

title: Target for Terror
description: Two political radicals abduct a judge's son and his girlfriend. Fortunately for them, the Hobo's ingenuity is brought to bear on the kidnappers.

title: Heritage
description: The Hobo finds an eccentric old gold prospector who's being harassed and intimidated by someone trying to acquire his mine.

title: Little Girl Lost
description: An ex-trucker tells the tale of a little girl who was lost deep in the woods and the heroic dog that watched over her until she was found.

title: Boy on Wheels
description: Hobo comes to the aid of a wheelchair-bound boy in rehab.

title: Stand-in
description: An electronics warehouse is repeatedly being hit by thieves who somehow have the ability to order the guard dog let them escape.

title: Second Chance
description: The Hobo discovers a drug smuggling operation. He's only able to bring this to the attention of an ex-con who doesn't want to get involved, but the smugglers wind up involving him anyway--as the fall guy.

title: Big Al and Sam Strawberry
description: The Hobo helps an artist out of temptation to embezzle a Van Gogh, as a desperate measure to pay off a mobster.

title: Give My Regards to Broadway
description: A struggling actress resorts to stealing (and writing IOUs) to make ends meet and the Hobo tries to keep her out of trouble.

title: The Last Job
description: An ex-convict has a bright future ahead of him, if he goes straight, but is compelled to perform one last bank robbery.

title: Snapshot
description: The Hobo and a boy disturb bank robbers working on a vault, late at night.

title: The Million Dollar Fur Heist
description: A drunken ex-trucker goes on a joy ride with the Hobo and is surprised to find that the truck he borrowed is full of stolen furs. His problems run deeper when the thieves learn where he (and his grandson) live.

title: Diamonds Are a Dog's Best Friend
description: A diamond thief uses an innocent magician as a fall guy and his act as a front for a major operation.

title: Romiet and Julio
description: The Hobo plays matchmaker to a young couple who, in between being separated by their respective parents, find time to bicker among themselves.

title: Escape
description: Hobo helps an escaped convict expose the mobster who set him up for murder.

title: Guardian Angel
description: A baby girl is abandoned on the steps of a church and the Hobo takes it upon himself to keep her from harm.

title: The Pied Piper
description: The Hobo and a janitor who has a soft spot for kids performs drama for children at a hospital, as a kind of therapy.

title: Willie and Kate
description: The Hobo tries to give support and guidance to a couple of quarrelsome human transients--one old man and one young girl.

title: The Further Adventures of Willie and Kate
description: The Hobo journeys onward, trying to keep his transient companions out of trouble, when Kate is captured by the authorities and placed in an orphanage run like a military academy.

title: The Balloonist
description: Hobo watches out for an enthusiastic balloonist with a heart condition, who doesn't listen to his doctor's advice (or his granddaughter's insistence) that he should take it easy.

title: Duddleman and the Diamond Ring
description: When a dispute erupts between a young couple and an old pawnshop owner, it accidentally turns into a kidnapping case. The Hobo comes along for the ride as the participants try to work out how to untangle their mess.

title: Guinea Pig
description: Hobo discovers that a well has been contaminated and tries everything he can to interfere with people using it for drinking water.

title: Trapper
description: Sam Burrows is a heartless animal trapper, using illegal steel traps that the Hobo cleverly disarms. When Burrows discovers this, he targets the Hobo.

title: The Pearls
description: The Hobo comes to the rescue of a ship's captain whose crew has mutinied and are looking for a lost treasure.

title: Carnival of Fear
description: A saboteur is causing deadly accidents at a carnival and the Hobo moves to unravel the mystery.

title: Mystery at the Zoo
description: An injured Hobo is picked up by a TV reporter and helps her find out who is stealing rare and expensive animals from a zoo.

title: Sailing Away
description: An inexperienced sailor deals with her frustrations by sailing in dangerous conditions. Fortunately, she has the Hobo with her to help her when she gets into trouble.

title: The Hunt
description: A stable groom is setup for theft and arson by a jealous member of the hunt club where she works, and the Hobo tries to expose the plot and prevent the fire at the same time.

title: Fast Freddie
description: The Hobo discovers a con man operating in a small town and tries to foil his plans to rob a doddering senior.

title: Licence to Steal
description: An employee at a junkyard is framed for a license plate theft operation by another employee and the Hobo tries to help him prove his innocence.

title: Portrait of Danger
description: A professional photographer gets pictures of a bank robbery in progress, but is slow to inform the police, putting Hobo in the role of bodyguard.

title: Ghost Rig
description: The Hobo and a mousy insurance agent investigate a diamond theft.

title: Here's Joey Jackson
description: A blackmailer is extorting money from a popular talk show host and the Hobo tries to expose the criminals and gain the attention of the police.

title: Runaway
description: An orphan in a Big Brother program feels rejected by his fraternal friend and runs away. The Hobo and a human peer work to reunite him with those who want to adopt him.

title: East Side Angels
description: An inner city basketball team has some problems with one of its members, but when he's unfairly accused of arson, the Hobo plays fire investigator to prove he wasn't at fault.

title: Mystique
description: Hobo takes up a case of a jealous model who uses an unscrupulous hypnotist to ruin a younger rival.

title: Photo Finish
description: The Hobo tries to keep a horse race fair when two thugs and a charming stranger try to fix it, by sabotaging the chances of an up and coming jockey.

title: The Secret of Red Hill
description: Big Foot has been sighted in a forest near a small town. The police don't take the sightings seriously, but the Hobo and a reporter seek it out.

title: Wolf Hunt
description: The Hobo decoys hunters away from a wounded wolf and her cubs.

title: The Day of the Fugitive
description: Hobo tracks a man suspected of having the plague, but in doing so, earns the suspicion of authorities, who are very determined to contain and eliminate the threat.

title: Suspect
description: A business man is framed for a murder, which the police fall for, and the Hobo conducts an investigation of his own.

title: War Games
description: During a military training exercise, a soldier is wounded trying to warn a civilian out of a mine field. Together with the Hobo, they find refuge in an old building that the civilian's father is tasked with blowing up.

title: The Hero
description: An intellectually handicapped man in a deerstalker and the Hobo discover a dognapping ring.

title: Hidden Room
description: Hobo discovers a man and his mute daughter are being blackmailed into performing fraudulent sances for bereaved victims.

title: Fussin' and Fightin'
description: A harmonic player resorts to skulduggery to oust a rival in a travelling country band.

title: Airport
description: The Hobo discovers someone trying to sabotage an air courier service, using measures that turn deadly.

title: Music Box
description: A little girl fantasizes about being a ballerina, like her mother, who is reluctant to have her daughter repeat her experiences.

title: The Clown
description: Hobo matches a retired clown--who can only dream of the glory days--with a fair that has a pressing need for talent.

title: Once Upon a Tyme
description: The Hobo tries to stop the owner of a theatre troupe from burning down his production to collect on insurance.

title: Forget Me Not
description: A woman with amnesia, and nearing diabetic shock, wanders around an empty amusement park.

title: Napoleon
description: The Hobo interrupts a pair of cattle thieves, but the crime is revealed to run much deeper: insurance fraud.

title: Home Free
description: A teen runs away from a detention centre and into the purview of a police officer and the Hobo.

title: Back to Nature
description: The Hobo guides a very pregnant woman through the wilderness, seeking medical attention.

title: The Imaginative Invalid
description: Hobo participates in a wealthy widow's ruse designed to straighten out her greedy heirs.

title: Finders Keepers
description: Hobo comes across a summer camp where he reunites with two boys whose lives he'd saved in previous episodes. An antagonistic and divisive counsellor uses their jealousy over the dog to set them against each other.

title: Happy Birthday Mom
description: Two brothers enter a bicycle race to win prize money to buy their mother a birthday present. One boy is willing to do anything to win and the Hobo moves to level the playing field.

title: The Spirit of Thunder Rock: Part 1
description: A seismologist takes his family along on a field assignment, where they are threatened by impending earthquakes of which only the Hobo appears to be fully aware.

title: The Spirit of Thunder Rock: Part 2
description: The quakes continue to imperil the now separated members of the family and an armed poacher who prefers his privacy only adds to the danger.

title: The Spirit of Thunder Rock: Part 3
description: The biggest quake of them all strikes and causes a cave-in, trapping Marti with the poacher.

title: Rabies
description: A rabid raccoon is on the loose and the Hobo tries to keep track of it while attracting the attention of nearby humans.

title: Day for Fright
description: The Hobo discovers two stagehands using a movie production set to cover their smuggling operation and helps an undercover policeman posing as an actor solve the crime.

title: Trooper
description: Following a chemical spill a nearby town is evacuated. A baby boy is left behind so the Hobo evacuates him.

title: The Loneliest Day of the Week
description: The Hobo discovers that a supposedly rich widow is really broke and matches her with a love-interest who thinks she is unattainable.

title: Double Vision
description: The twin of a corrupt mayor wanders into town and is frequently mistaken for his brother by the media and an equally unscrupulous mayoral candidate.

title: The Five Labours of Hercules: Part 1
description: A boy with a leg injury has his heart set on buying a pure-bred dog, but needs to raise the money fast, so the Hobo helps him with a dog-sitting service.

title: The Five Labours of Hercules: Part 2
description: The Hobo must escape from a dog catcher's van and round up several unruly dogs which quickly bring havoc to wherever they roam.

title: Rookie
description: Hobo befriends police officers in a K-9 unit who are searching for a runaway teen with a brain tumour.

title: Scavenger Hunt: Part 1
description: As a requirement for acceptance to a fraternity, three teams are competing in a scavenger hunt. Some of the players are willing to do anything to win and the Hobo is there to prevent them from going that far.

title: Scavenger Hunt: Part 2
description: Contestants continue to put themselves in danger, private property continues to go missing, and Hobo keeps dashing across town trying to right the wrongs done in the name of competition.

title: Second Sight
description: Hobo gives guidance to a dejected, newly blinded equestrian rider.

title: Trucker
description: A shipper with a reputation for dirty dealing pressures a desperate trucker into working for him.

title: Born to Run
description: A race dog contending for a national championship is stolen by a rival's owner. The Hobo trails the thief to his home, but must outwit a large dog and a human, who is armed with a gun.

title: Tempest Probe
description: An eccentric criminal mastermind uses high-tech gadgets and a dog to perform heists. When he has designs on a military laser, the Hobo sabotages the operation.

title: Lumberjacks
description: A bookie tries to fix a lumberjack competition using extreme methods.

title: Passage
description: The Hobo waivers between confounding a hunter who is being paid a large sum a money to catch a falcon and helping him when he gets into trouble.

title: Sartech: Part 1
description: The Hobo discovers a small aircraft crashed in a forest in the wilderness. All passengers and crew survive the crash, but some are seriously wounded and the radio doesn't work.

title: Sartech: Part 2
description: Search and rescue is dispatched, but without a working emergency transmitter, the plane is difficult to find. Some of the more seriously injured passengers' conditions worsen and another turns out to be a diabetic, short on insulin.

title: Dragonslayer
description: Four kids play a Dark Ages fantasy game and Hobo acts as a spirit guide, protecting them from real dangers.

title: The Genesis Tapes: Part 1
description: A TV reporter and a cryptozoologist discover the hobo when researching archival footage of his many adventures and seek to trap him. But since the prevailing assumption is that there are many dogs of his kind, there is talk of dissecting him!

title: The Genesis Tapes: Part 2
description: Hobo continues to amaze the ambitious humans who are stalking him and must use all of his super-canine cunning not only to evade capture, but also to keep his secret.

title: Ghost Station
description: An archaeologist is clandestinely digging for human remains in a subway station, when he is unfairly mixed up in a theft.

title: Indian Summer
description: The Hobo and a group of seniors match wits with the corrupt and abusive staff at a retirement home.

title: Applejack
description: Two bootleggers working at an orchard steal their employers apples and make alcohol with them. When they setup an honest colleague, who is short on English, the Hobo moves to expose the entire operation and the crooked employees.

title: Sheep in Wolf's Clothing
description: A marauding wolf is killing sheep and threatening the family that owns them. Hobo tries to defend both, but is believed to be the danger.

title: Second Best
description: Hobo lends moral support to a boy in a new school who wants to try out for the track team but is rejected by his new peers.

title: Three Monkeys of Bah Roghar: Part 1
description: Priceless statuettes are disappearing from the hotel in which they are on display, and it falls to Hobo to expose who among several colorful characters are responsible.

title: Three Monkeys of Bah Roghar: Part 2
description: All of the statuettes disappear and the Hobo works with one of the hotel's more scrupulous staffers to solve the mystery.

title: Rodeo
description: The Hobo helps a rodeo star suffering from PTSD overcome his fear of animals.

title: One Door Closes
description: A grumpy, but industrious, owner of a construction firm suffers an accident on the job, leaving him paralyzed. Despite his hard-to-love attitude, his wife and the Hobo stand by him for his physiotherapy and while he reassesses his talents.

title: Lucky
description: When a movie production comes to town, a reckless, adrenaline-addicted stuntman tries to get the director's attention, so the Hobo, his daughter and the local sheriff try to keep him safe.

title: Arrivederci Roma
description: When a gifted kid tries to enter a national remote-controlled airplane tournament, a competitor tries to sabotage his equipment. Fortunately, the Hobo is there for counter-espionage.

title: Matchmaker
description: A young upper class snob tries to hector his sister's new boyfriend out of her life. When that doesn't work, he challenges his rival to a tennis match, not realizing that a pro is willing to stand-in for him.

title: Firehorse: Part 1
description: A hero firefighter dodges a medical order relieving him of duty, endangering his own life.

title: Firehorse: Part 2
description: The sick firefighter continues to put himself in harms way, while Hobo tries to call attention to the problem.

title: Prodigal Son
description: The Hobo discovers a man pretending to be a wayward son, wanting to reintegrate himself into a community of Mennonites.

title: Torque
description: A go-kart mechanic for a racing team wants to drive and is willing to sabotage his team's vehicles to do it. This leads to a talented girl to try out for the team, causing even more tension.

title: Small Change
description: Two lowlifes plan to rob a small business owner the day before he retires, and the Hobo along with a mime and a deaf-mute youth try to stop them.

title: Voyageurs: Part 1
description: Hobo joins the Farrells on a luxury yachting expedition, which enters a storm and shipwrecks the crew on an uninhabited island.

title: Voyageurs: Part 2
description: The elusive stranger turns out to be a Soviet air force pilot who has been stranded on the island for some time.

title: Liar, Liar
description: A troublemaking boy pretends to be a victim of a hit-and-run, winning attention from his enabling parents. When a witness and the Hobo move to expose him, he threatens retaliation.

title: Pandora
description: The Hobo discovers a senile veteran who is the custodian of an unexploded bomb. He is able to bring it to the attention of a nearby military base, but the stakes are raised when it's discovered that it is near an abandoned munitions dump.
